AtAqnAstEBya# Eqva nama#skarOtyanaqrvA prEhItyA#haq BrAtRu#vyOq vA arvAq BrAtRu#vyApanuttyai GRuqtasya# kuqlyAmanu# saqha praqjayA# saqha rAqyaspOShEqNE-tyA#hAq &&*SiSha#mEqvaitAmA SA$staq ApO# dEvIH 
SuddhAyuvaq ityA#ha yathAyaqjurEqvaitat || 44 
(lOqkAya# nIyatEq yad - baqraq.hI - raqSmaya#H - saqptatri(gm)#Sacca) (A8)
